about_me_p1: Hey there! I'm a frontend developer hailing from Saarbr√ºcken, Germany. Programming is not just my job; it's my passion. I enjoy shaping the future through my work by using innovative technologies and contributing to the advancement of digitization.
about_me_p2: My knowledge of the most relevant tech stack for front-end development makes me a capable developer. With experience and enthusiasm, I am able to tackle challenging projects.
about_me_p3: The intensive course at the Developer Akademie has equipped me well for the job ahead. I'm brimming with confidence and ready to showcase my skills in a challenging work setting.
my_skills_p: By learning constantly and gaining practical experience, I've improved my skills in frontend development.
portfolio_span: Explore a selection of my work here - Interact with projects to see my skills in action.
el_pollo_loco_description: Jump and run and game based on object-oriented approach. Help Pepe to find coins and tabasco salsa to fight against the crazy hen.
join_description: Task manager inspired by the Kanban System. Create and organize tasks using drag and drop functions, assign users and categories.
pokedex_description: Unlock the ultimate Pok√©mon encyclopedia with our REST API-powered archive. Discover all Pok√©mons and their details with ease.
contact_p: Contact me through this form, I am interested in hearing from you, knowing your ideas and contributing to your projects with my work.
checkbox2: and agree to the processing of my data as outlined.
privacy_policy_span1: This Privacy Policy outlines how I, Hassan Ammar, collect and handle your personal information when you visit my website. As the sole creator of this portfolio, I am committed to maintaining your privacy and ensuring the security of any personal information you provide.
privacy_policy_p1: I may collect personal information from you when you voluntarily fill out a contact form on my website. This information typically includes your name and email address, along with any message you choose to send me.
privacy_policy_p2: I use the personal information you provide solely for the purpose of responding to your inquiries or messages. I do not use this information for any other purpose, such as marketing or promotional activities.
privacy_policy_p3: Your privacy and the security of your personal information are of utmost importance to me. I have implemented appropriate measures to safeguard your information from unauthorized access or disclosure.
privacy_policy_p4: I do not share, sell, or trade your personal information with third parties. Your information remains confidential and is only accessible to me for handling inquiries or maintaining my website.
privacy_policy_p5: I do not use cookies on my website. Therefore, no information is automatically collected about your visit or browsing activities.
privacy_policy_p6: My website may contain links to third-party websites for informational purposes only. I do not guarantee the accuracy, relevance, timeliness, or completeness of any information on these external websites.
privacy_policy_p7: I reserve the right to update or modify this Privacy Policy as necessary. Any changes will be posted on this page.
privacy_policy_span2: If you have any questions or concerns regarding this Privacy Policy or the handling of your personal information, please don't hesitate to contact me using the information provided below:
legal_notice_span: This website is owned and operated by Hassan Ammar, who is responsible for its content and can be contacted using the information provided below.

Any reliance you place on such information is therefore strictly at your own risk.

legal_notice_p4: I reserve the right to update or modify this Legal Notice at any time without prior notice. Any changes will be posted on this page.
legal_notice_p5: If you have any questions or concerns regarding this Legal Notice or wish to contact me for any reason, please use the contact information provided above.
